thread.title: Another one night stay
thread.title_full: Another one night stay - Review of Novotel Roma Eur, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: LukasVarnauskas
title: Another one night stay
text: It's been second time I stayed in this Hotel, arrived at around 4am as I needed a place to spend the night with my friend and got greeted really nicely (the night shifter there is awesome, He even recognised me from the last time)! The room was spacious and nice with a huge balcony (I'm a heavy smoker, so that was a relief for me). To sum everything up I've had really good experience in Novotel. Till the next time!
